title: Two Sum
question: Given an array of integers nums and an integer target, return indices of the two numbers that add up to target. Exactly one solution exists.
hint: Use a hash map to store complements. O(n) time.
explain: Iterate once through the array. For each number, compute its complement (target - num) and check if it exists in a hash map.

title: Best Time to Buy and Sell Stock
question: Given prices[i] as the stock price on day i, find the maximum profit from buying low and selling later.
explain: Single pass greedy. Track minimum price and compute profit at each step.
code:
def maxProfit(prices):
    min_p = float('inf')
    max_p = 0
    for p in prices:
        min_p = min(min_p, p)
        max_p = max(max_p, p - min_p)
    return max_p
